snippet.title: PICO PARK (Old Version)  :Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
PICO PARK is an action puzzle game in which all the players watch a single screen and play by cooperating in a large group. This time it is possible to play with a maximum of 10 people.

The players will aim for the goal by alternating between individual players operating one character and all the players operating one character. 

There is no competition. The game requires everyone’s cooperation. If you are a skilled player, please help the less-skilled players.

this is registered at Steam Greenlight. if you feel fun , please vote !

PICO PARK は 大人数で一つの画面を見ながら遊ぶ協力型アクションパズルゲームです。2人から最大10人で遊べます。

1人で1キャラクターを操作したり、みんなで1キャラクターを操作したりしながらゴールを目指します。

このゲームは助け合う気持ちがとても重要になります。上手な人は苦手な人をフォローしてあげてください。

website:http://picoparkgame.com
steam greenlight:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516792823
twitter : @teco_park(https://twitter.com/teco_park)
